Text:
I don't know you read these comments or not, but I want to thank you for all of the uploads. Everytime I look for great movies, my search stops at you. I request you to re-seed "The Magnificent Seven", I am stuck at 24% for past 27 hrs.
I also request you to re-seed two of you previous uploads: "The Last Emperor" and "Tora!Tora!Tora!". These great movie shouldn't die. Please seed these dying torrents.
Thanks in advance.
Good quality!!!! Use BSPLAYER to play this movie as its MKV. works well with that
